summary: Frontend testing completed for Mathpix Snip Clone. All requested features verified working correctly including the bug fix for recognition result panel display.

issues: WebSocket connection error in console (ws://localhost:443/ws) - non-blocking, appears to be hot reload related

critical_code_review_comments: OCR is MOCKED - simulateOCR in /app/frontend/src/data/mock.js returns random mock results
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working: handwriting canvas (draw, erase, clear, color change), recognition result panel display (BUG FIX VERIFIED), language switching FR/EN, snip collection selection, OCR result display with multiple formats (LaTeX, MathML, AsciiMath, Text), copy functionality

handwriting_canvas.details: Drawing, erasing, clearing, color selection (6 colors), brush size adjustment all working

recognition_result_panel.details: Panel with data-testid='recognition-result-panel' displays correctly next to canvas after clicking 'Reconna√Ætre'. Shows handwriting snapshot, recognized equation, LaTeX code, copy/download buttons

recognize_button.details: Button triggers OCR simulation (2 second delay), shows loading state, displays result panel

snip_collection.details: 6 mock snips displayed in right panel, clicking snip shows OCR result with LaTeX/MathML/AsciiMath/Text formats

language_switching.details: FR/EN switching works - UI text, date formats, button labels all update correctly

copy_formats.details: Multiple format tabs (LaTeX, MathML, AsciiMath, Text) with copy buttons available

image_upload.details: Upload area visible and clickable, but file upload not tested via automation

mocked_apis_list: simulateOCR in /app/frontend/src/data/mock.js - returns random mock OCR results after 2 second delay
